title: Individual Autonomy and Agency During Temporary Vulnerability
description: As a person experiencing temporary vulnerability I want to maintain individual autonomy and decision-making authority So that I can rebuild my life according to my values while receiving dignified support
content:
Feature: Individual Autonomy and Agency During Temporary Vulnerability
  As a person experiencing temporary vulnerability
  I want to maintain individual autonomy and decision-making authority
  So that I can rebuild my life according to my values while receiving dignified support

  Background:
    Given I am navigating temporary vulnerability
    And I am using the Value Scanner to coordinate crisis support
    And my personal_agent is active and supporting me
    And my care contributions are being tracked and recognized

  Scenario: Maintaining decision-making authority during crisis intervention
    Given I am experiencing a housing crisis
    And multiple support agencies want to "help" me
    When I express my preferences for how I want to resolve the situation
    Then the Value Scanner supports MY chosen path
    And does not override my decisions with institutional preferences
    And tracks my decision-making as evidence of my capability
    And connects me to resources that respect my autonomy
    And my personal_agent advocates for my choices in institutional contexts
    And the system recognizes that I am the expert on my own life
    And support is offered as scaffolding, not control
    And my agency is preserved even while I'm receiving assistance

  Scenario: Tracking personal goals and progress during crisis recovery
    Given I am rebuilding my life after leaving an abusive relationship
    And I have set personal goals for stability and independence
    When I make progress toward my goals (even small steps)
    Then the Value Scanner celebrates my achievements
    And tracks my progress without imposing external timelines
    And helps me identify next steps at my pace
    And recognizes setbacks as normal parts of recovery
    And maintains my focus on my vision for my future
    And counters institutional pressure to recover "faster" or "properly"
    And my personal_agent reminds me of how far I've come
    And validates that my timeline is the right timeline

  Scenario: Managing privacy and information sharing on my terms
    Given I have sensitive information about my situation
    And multiple institutions are requesting access to my data
    When I decide what to share and with whom
    Then the Value Scanner gives me granular control over all data sharing
    And defaults to maximum privacy protection
    And clearly explains consequences of sharing vs. not sharing
    And never shares information without my explicit consent
    And helps me understand my rights regarding privacy
    And protects me from institutional coercion to over-share
    And my personal_agent alerts me to privacy risks
    And my safety-critical information remains absolutely protected

  Scenario: Accessing crisis resources without losing dignity
    Given I need immediate assistance with food and housing
    And I am worried about stigma and degradation
    When I access support through the care economy network
    Then resources are provided based on my care contributions, not means-testing
    And I am treated as a community member deserving support
    And there is no requirement to prove I'm "needy enough"
    And I don't have to expose private trauma to gatekeepers
    And assistance is framed as reciprocal care, not charity
    And the system recognizes my parenting labor as valuable contribution
    And my dignity is preserved throughout the support process
    And I maintain my standing as a person, not a "case"

  Scenario: Exercising financial autonomy despite constrained resources
    Given I am managing an extremely limited budget
    And I have temporary assistance and unreliable child support
    When I make spending decisions for my household
    Then the Value Scanner supports MY financial choices
    And does not impose external judgments about "proper" spending
    And helps me track and optimize within my constraints
    And recognizes that I understand my children's needs
    And provides decision support without taking over decisions
    And validates that my resource management under crisis is sophisticated work
    And my personal_agent suggests options without prescribing choices
    And my financial sovereignty is respected

  Scenario: Setting boundaries with institutions and service providers
    Given I am navigating multiple social service systems
    And some institutional demands feel invasive or harmful
    When I identify a boundary I need to maintain
    Then the Value Scanner helps me understand my rights
    And provides language for asserting my boundaries
    And tracks instances where institutions violate my boundaries
    And connects me to advocacy support when needed
    And validates that boundary-setting is healthy and appropriate
    And my personal_agent coaches me through difficult conversations
    And recognizes that protecting my wellbeing is my right
    And supports me in saying "no" when necessary

  Scenario: Rebuilding self-concept after trauma and loss
    Given my sense of self has been damaged by abuse and crisis
    And I struggle with self-blame and internalized stigma
    When I engage with the Value Scanner over time
    Then the system consistently reflects my worth and capability
    And makes visible my substantial care contributions
    And celebrates my strengths and achievements
    And reframes "survival" as sophisticated, valuable work
    And counters stigmatizing narratives about people in crisis
    And my personal_agent provides affirming, non-judgmental support
    And the care economy recognizes me as valuable community member
    And I see evidence of my competence and contributions

  Scenario: Making major life decisions under extreme stress
    Given I need to make important decisions about housing, employment, or children's needs
    And I am traumatized, exhausted, and overwhelmed
    When I need to evaluate my options
    Then my personal_agent helps me process complex information
    And breaks down overwhelming decisions into manageable steps
    And provides decision support without making decisions for me
    And helps me identify my priorities and values
    And surfaces relevant information at the right time
    And prevents decision paralysis without overriding my agency
    And validates that my stress is reasonable given my circumstances
    And trusts that I can make good decisions with appropriate support

  Scenario: Asserting parenting authority despite institutional scrutiny
    Given institutions are monitoring my parenting during crisis
    And I fear judgment or intervention
    When I make parenting decisions based on my knowledge of my children
    Then the Value Scanner validates my parental authority
    And documents my sophisticated parenting labor
    And helps me articulate my parenting reasoning to institutions
    And recognizes that I am the expert on my children's needs
    And supports me in resisting inappropriate institutional interference
    And my personal_agent helps me present my parenting capability effectively
    And the care token system makes visible my substantial parenting contributions
    And my parenting is recognized as valuable work, not scrutinized as potential failure

  Scenario: Choosing my own timeline for crisis recovery
    Given well-meaning people have expectations about how quickly I should "move on"
    And I am recovering at my own pace
    When external pressure conflicts with my needs
    Then the Value Scanner supports my chosen timeline
    And validates that recovery is not linear
    And helps me resist pressure to rush or perform recovery
    And tracks my progress according to my goals, not external standards
    And recognizes that trauma recovery takes time
    And my personal_agent reminds me that my pace is appropriate
    And celebrates progress without imposing arbitrary milestones
    And supports my right to heal in my own way

  Scenario: Maintaining identity beyond crisis circumstances
    Given I am defined by institutions as "domestic violence survivor" or "homeless person"
    And I am much more than my current circumstances
    When I interact with the Value Scanner
    Then the system recognizes my full humanity and complexity
    And documents my interests, skills, values, and dreams
    And reflects back my identity beyond crisis labels
    And helps me pursue aspects of life that matter to me
    And validates that crisis is something I'm experiencing, not who I am
    And my personal_agent knows and responds to my whole self
    And the care economy values me as complete person
    And my identity is not reduced to my vulnerability

  Scenario: Exercising the right to change my mind and try different approaches
    Given I am trying various strategies for rebuilding stability
    And some approaches work better than others
    When I decide to change direction or try something new
    Then the Value Scanner supports my experimentation without judgment
    And does not penalize me for changing course
    And helps me learn from what didn't work
    And validates that finding the right path takes trial and error
    And institutional partners respect my right to redirect
    And my personal_agent helps me evaluate different approaches
    And tracks what I've learned, not just what "failed"
    And my agency to pivot is preserved and supported
